document_data.name: Mucknuggle
document_data.deathnotes: (Stabbed through the eye by [[Artemis Entreri]] in [[Mithral Hall]])
document_data.mainbody: '''Mucknuggle''' was an elderly [[duergar]] who worked in [[Mithral Hall]], during the reign of [[Haerinvureem]].
document_data.Description: The [[dwarf]] had a long gray beard.
document_data.Relationships: Mucknuggle was a member of [[Clan Bukbukken]] under the command of the [[shadow dragon]] [[Shimmergloom]].
document_data.Possessions: When on patrol, the guard wore [[mithral]] [[chainmail]] and fought with a [[broadsword]] and [[shield]].
document_data.History: In [[1356 DR]], Mucknuggle encountered [[Drizzt Do'Urden]] and [[Artemis Entreri]] in the lower tunnels of Mithral Hall. In a later skirmish, Mucknuggle was killed when the [[assassin]] put a [[dagger]] through his eye when Drizzt showed the dwarf mercy.
